sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row
      class="d-flex justify-end align-center mt-1"
  >
    <v-btn
        fab
        icon
        class="elevation-14 header__btn header__btn-login"
        @click="onClick"
    >
      <v-icon :size="iconsSize">
        mdi-login-variant
      </v-icon>
    </v-btn>
    <v-list v-if="visible" class="auth-btn__menu-list d-flex">
      <v-list-item
          class="auth-btn__menu-list__item d-flex align-center mx-1"
          v-for="(item, i) in items"
          :key="i"
      >
        <v-btn
            color="primary"
            class="auth-btn__menu-list__item__btn elevation-14 d-flex">
          {{ item.title }}
        </v-btn>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "the-authorization-button-menu",
  data: () => ({
    items: [
      {
        title: 'register',
      },
      {
        title: 'login',
      }
    ],
    visible: false
  }),
  methods: {
    onClick(e) {
      this.visible = !this.visible;
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
